name: Barrel On [VR]
description:
Description

Drive your handgun like a toy car in this physics-based arcade runner!

Shoot stuff and perform sick flips to reload.

Play seated or standing. It even works singlehanded!

This project is very early in development so any feedback is welcome!

Join my Discord to stay tuned: https://discord.gg/bKE8RzsHv3

Barrel On is currently only supported on Meta Quest
